collection_id.label: Collection ID
collection_id.description: Optional identifier for identifying a collection of records

record_id.label: Record identifier
record_id.description: User provided or autogenerated record identifier

attribute_last_updated.label: Attribute last updated date
attribute_last_updated.description: The time an attribute was last updated

relationship_id.label: Relationship ID
relationship_id.description: User provided or auto-generated relationship identifier

relationship_last_updated.label: Relationship last updated date
relationship_last_updated.description: The time a relationship was last updated

from_record_number.label: From record number
from_record_number.description: The record number this relationship is coming from

from_record_id.label: From record id
from_record_id.description: The record id this relationship is coming from

from_record_type.label: From record type
from_record_type.description: The record type this relationship is coming from

from_record_source.label: From record source
from_record_source.description: The record source this relationship is coming from

to_record_number.label: To record number
to_record_number.description: The record number this relationship is going to

to_record_id.label: To record id
to_record_id.description: The record id this relationship is going to

to_record_type.label: To record type
to_record_type.description: The record type this relationship is going to

to_record_source.label: To record source
to_record_source.description: The record source this relationship is going to

person_entity.label: Person Entity
person_entity.description: Identity entity type for Person record types

organization_entity.label: Organization Entity
organization_entity.description: Identity entity type for Organization record types

linkage.label: Linkage
linkage.description: This is the built in linkage relationship type the matching engine creates between records and their resolved entities

employment.label: Employee
employment.description: For employee relationships between Person and Org records
